name: Lull Farm
notes: Just 10 minutes from Nashua. Family-owned since 1962, offering houseplants, annuals, and organic produce.

name: Campbell's Nurseries & Garden Centers
notes: 15 minutes west. Extensive greenhouse selection, landscaping services, and seasonal workshops.

name: Wagon Wheel Nursery
notes: 10 minutes north. Wide variety of indoor plants, garden supplies, and expert advice.

name: Demers Garden Center
notes: 20 minutes north. Full-service center with tropicals, succulents, and custom container gardens.

name: Pelham Nurseries
notes: 15 minutes east. Specializes in native plants, shade perennials, and organic gardening supplies.
